name: regional-monitoring
description: Display normalized choropleth maps in the browser

scripts.start: cp node_modules/shpjs/dist/shp.min.js build/ & npm run watch-js & npm run serve
scripts.package: npm run dist && zip -r build/regional-monitoring.zip dist/*
scripts.dist: rm -Rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/build && cp -R build dist/ && npm run minify-js && cp -R index.html assets dist/

author: Andreas Hocevar
